price: او اى قومه! كه زه دغه خلک وشړم نو د الله له نيونې څخه به ما څوک وژغوري؟ نو آیا پند نه اخلئ؟
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi man yanṣurunī mina al-lahi in ṭaradttuhum afalā tadhakkarūna
